name: Psychic Vampire
description: The Psychic Vampire is a Medium-sized undead with a formidable presence, embodying a blend of sophistication and malice. It features extraordinary mental powers, allowing it to incapacitate foes through psychic manipulation. It has a durable physique, with notable agility and strength.
memorable: Its ability to incapacitate targets through mental manipulation and convert slain foes into vampire spawn makes it a uniquely terrifying opponent.
goals: To manipulate and control its foes while sustaining itself through psychic drain and converting enemies into followers.
relations: Related to other vampire species, potentially found in the company of other undead or evil-aligned creatures.
environment: Typically found in dark and desolate places, where it can exert its mind over others without interference.
strengths: Immunity to psychic damage and resistance to necrotic damage allows it to withstand various forms of attacks, while its legendary resistance ensures survival against powerful spells.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to sunlight and has restrictions on entering premises without an invitation, limiting its mobility.
attacks: Uses Imprison Mind to incapacitate, followed by Psychic Assault to deal psychic damage and instill memory loss in enemies.
most_powerful_ability: Imprison Mind ability can incapacitate opponents for up to a minute, rendering them helpless and vulnerable.
additional_information: Can summon additional creatures with Knowledge Keepers ability
Regenerates health unless exposed to radiant damage or holy water
Can levitate and climb walls, making it difficult to pin down
Possesses legendary actions for additional tactical advantages
Can convert slain humanoids into vampire spawn
test_queries: creature that manipulates minds and drains life
vampire that can summon allies in battle
cunning undead that thrives in darkness
